slack.label: Slack
slack.description: To enable Slack notifications, create a Slack app and enable incoming webhooks. After that, simply provide the webhook URL here.

discord.label: Discord
discord.description: To send data to a Discord channel from Checkmate via Discord notifications using webhooks, you can use Discord's incoming Webhooks feature.

telegram.label: Telegram
telegram.description: To enable Telegram notifications, create a Telegram bot using BotFather, an official bot for creating and managing Telegram bots. Then, get the API token and chat ID and write them down here.
telegram.fieldsRequired: Telegram token and chat ID are required

webhook.label: Webhooks
webhook.description: You can set up a custom webhook to receive notifications when incidents occur.
